turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to place an order at my Starbucks at Rutgers University student center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking of cinnamon dolce latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall with whole milk and, I do want whipped cream on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall cinnamon dolce latte with whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the student center at Rutgers University. At the Newark Robeson student center.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In New York New Jersey, I don't know if I have specified that or not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks at Rutgers University.
